flow.header: Follow our guide to pair your Discord account with the 2FAS app.

menu.title: Please select the method you use to open Discord now

steps.content: Go to **www.discord.com** and log into your account.
Click **User Settings** icon in the down left-hand menu.
In **My Account** scroll down to **TWO-FACTOR AUTHENTICATION** and click **Enable Two-Factor Auth**.
You may be asked to enter your password for security reasons. Enter the password and click **Continue**.

Scan the QR code. Scanning the QR code will generate a token in the 2FAS app. Retype it and click **Activate**.

Remember to get your backup codes from Discord!
Open Discord, and tap on your account icon in the down left corner to expand the side menu.
Choose **Account**, then find and tap **Enable Two-Factor Auth**.
You may be asked to enter your password for security reasons. Enter your password and tap **Okay**.

Copy or rewrite the **2FA Code** (it is your **Secret Key**) and use **Add manually** option below to add Discord to your 2FAS app. When ready, proceed to the next step and click **Next**. Retype the token generated by the 2FAS app.
